meanings.sent1: The school held a concours to see who could run the fastest.
meanings.sent2: The spelling bee was a concours to find the best speller in the class.
meanings.sent3: The annual pie-eating concours was a messy but fun event.
meanings.sent4: In the fierce concours of business, only the most determined succeed.
meanings.sent5: The concours for the title of 'Best Dancer' brought out the hidden talents of many.

meanings.definition: An exhibition or show of vehicles, typically cars.
meanings.sent1: Car enthusiasts gathered at the concours to admire vintage vehicles.
meanings.sent2: The classic car concours showcased beautifully restored automobiles.
meanings.sent3: The concours of luxury cars made the onlookers dream of owning one.
meanings.sent4: The concours of sports cars gleamed under the bright sun at the event.
meanings.sent5: Visitors marveled at the concours of rare and exotic cars on display.
